code: import axios from"axios";import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Payments(){const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[amount,setAmount]=useState("");const[date,setDate]=useState("");const[payments,setPayments]=useState([]);const makePayment=async()=>{await axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/payments",{username,amount:parseFloat(amount),date});alert("Payment successful");};useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://127.0.0.1:8000/payments").then(res=>setPayments(res.data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Payments"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Username",onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Amount",onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",onChange:e=>setDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:makePayment,children:"Pay"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:payments.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[p.username," - \u20B9",p.amount," - ",p.date]},p.id))})]});}export default Payments;
